title: Driver Function Block
description:
KMH_TO_MS converts value to a speed of kilomter per Hour in meters per
second. KMH_TO_MS := KMH / 3.6
name: DRIVER_1

input.name: Toggle_Mode
input.description: A boolean input that determines whether the output Q should toggle its state.

input.name: Timeout
input.description: The duration after which the output will reset, if applicable.

input.name: SET
input.description: A boolean input to set the output Q to TRUE.

input.name: IN
input.description: A boolean input to indicate the control state; it may trigger toggling of the output Q.

input.name: RST
input.description: A boolean input to reset the output Q to FALSE.

output.name: Q
output.description: The output signal that indicates the state of the driver.
